items.name: plate
items.description: Use `npx shadcn@latest add https://platejs.org/r/<name>` to install items from this registry.

items.name: ai-menu
items.title: AI Menu
items.description: A menu for AI-powered content generation and insertion.

items.name: ai-toolbar-button
items.title: AI Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar button for accessing AI features.

items.name: align-dropdown-menu
items.title: Align Dropdown Menu
items.description: A dropdown menu for text alignment controls.

items.name: block-context-menu
items.title: Block Context Menu
items.description: A context menu for block-level operations.

items.name: block-selection
items.title: Block Selection
items.description: A visual overlay for selected blocks.

items.name: import-toolbar-button
items.title: Import Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar button to import editor content from a file.

items.name: export-toolbar-button
items.title: Export Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar button to export editor content as PDF.

items.name: caption
items.title: Caption
items.description: A text field for adding captions to media elements.

items.name: color-dropdown-menu
items.title: Color Dropdown Menu
items.description: A color picker with text and background color controls.

items.name: comment-toolbar-button
items.title: Comment Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar button for adding inline comments.

items.name: block-discussion
items.title: Block Discussion
items.description: A popover interface for managing discussions: comments, replies, suggestions.

items.name: cursor-overlay
items.title: Cursor Overlay
items.description: A visual overlay for cursors and selections.

items.name: draggable
items.title: Draggable
items.description: A drag handle for moving editor blocks.

items.name: editor
items.title: Editor
items.description: A container for the editor content and styling.

items.name: select-editor
items.title: Select Editor
items.description: An editor to select tags.

items.name: emoji-dropdown-menu
items.title: Emoji Dropdown Menu
items.description: A dropdown menu for emoji selection and insertion.

items.name: fixed-toolbar-buttons
items.title: Fixed Toolbar Buttons
items.description: A set of commonly used formatting buttons.

items.name: fixed-toolbar
items.title: Fixed Toolbar
items.description: A fixed toolbar that stays at the top of the editor.

items.name: floating-toolbar-buttons
items.title: Floating Toolbar Buttons
items.description: A set of formatting buttons for the floating toolbar.

items.name: floating-toolbar
items.title: Floating Toolbar
items.description: A contextual toolbar that appears over selected text.

items.name: ghost-text
items.title: Ghost Text
items.description: A text suggestion system that displays AI-generated content after the cursor.

items.name: history-toolbar-button
items.title: History Toolbar Button
items.description: Toolbar buttons for undo and redo operations.

items.name: indent-list-toolbar-button
items.title: Indent List Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for adjusting list indentation.

items.name: indent-todo-marker
items.title: Indent Todo Marker
items.description: A checkbox marker for interactive todo lists.

items.name: indent-todo-toolbar-button
items.title: Indent Todo Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for creating todo list items.

items.name: indent-toolbar-button
items.title: Indent Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for block indentation.

items.name: inline-combobox
items.title: Inline Combobox
items.description: A combobox for inline suggestions.

items.name: insert-dropdown-menu
items.title: Insert Dropdown Menu
items.description: A menu for inserting different types of blocks.

items.name: line-height-dropdown-menu
items.title: Line Height Dropdown Menu
items.description: A menu for controlling text line spacing.

items.name: link-floating-toolbar
items.title: Link Floating Toolbar
items.description: A floating interface for link editing.

items.name: link-toolbar-button
items.title: Link Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for link management.

items.name: list-indent-toolbar-button
items.title: List Indent Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for indenting lists.

items.name: list-toolbar-button
items.title: List Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for list creation and management.

items.name: mark-toolbar-button
items.title: Mark Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for basic text formatting.

items.name: media-popover
items.title: Media Popover
items.description: A popover interface for media settings.

items.name: media-toolbar-button
items.title: Media Toolbar Button
items.description: Toolbar button for inserting and managing media.

items.name: media-upload-toast
items.title: Media Upload Toast
items.description: Show toast notifications for media uploads.

items.name: mode-dropdown-menu
items.title: Mode Dropdown Menu
items.description: A menu for switching between editor modes.

items.name: more-dropdown-menu
items.title: More Dropdown Menu
items.description: A menu for additional text formatting options.

items.name: outdent-toolbar-button
items.title: Outdent Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar button for decreasing block indentation.

items.name: placeholder
items.title: Placeholder
items.description: A text placeholder for empty editor blocks.

items.name: resize-handle
items.title: Resize Handle
items.description: A resizable wrapper with resize handles.

items.name: table-dropdown-menu
items.title: Table Dropdown Menu
items.description: A menu for table manipulation and formatting.

items.name: toggle-toolbar-button
items.title: Toggle Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar button for expanding and collapsing blocks.

items.name: turn-into-dropdown-menu
items.title: Turn Into Dropdown Menu
items.description: A menu for converting between different block types.

items.name: remote-cursor-overlay
items.title: Remote Cursor Overlay
items.description: A cursor overlay to display multiplayer cursors in the yjs plugin.

items.name: toolbar
items.title: Toolbar
items.description: A customizable toolbar component with various button styles and group

items.name: ai-leaf
items.title: AI Leaf
items.description: A text highlighter for AI-generated content.

items.name: blockquote-element
items.title: Blockquote Element
items.description: A quote component for block quotes.

items.name: callout-element
items.description: A callout component for highlighting important information with customizable icons and styles.

items.name: code-block-element
items.title: Code Block Element
items.description: A code block with syntax highlighting and language selection.

items.name: code-leaf
items.title: Code Leaf
items.description: An inline component for code snippets.

items.name: code-line-element
items.title: Code Line Element
items.description: A line component for code blocks.

items.name: code-syntax-leaf
items.title: Code Syntax Leaf
items.description: A syntax highlighting component for code blocks.

items.name: column-element
items.title: Column Element
items.description: A resizable column component for layout.

items.name: column-group-element
items.title: Column Group Element
items.description: A resizable column component for layout.

items.name: comment-leaf
items.title: Comment Leaf
items.description: A text component for displaying comments with visual indicators.

items.name: suggestion-leaf
items.title: Suggestion Leaf
items.description: A text component for suggestion.

items.name: suggestion-line-break
items.title: Suggestion Line Break
items.description: A line break component for suggestion.

items.name: date-element
items.title: Date Element
items.description: A date field component with calendar picker.

items.name: equation-element
items.title: Equation Element
items.description: Displays a LaTeX equation element with an editable popover for inputting and rendering mathematical expressions.

items.name: inline-equation-element
items.title: Inline Equation Element
items.description: An inline LaTeX equation element with an editable popover for inputting and rendering mathematical expressions.

items.name: inline-equation-toolbar-button
items.title: Inline Equation Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar button for inserting and editing inline equations.

items.name: emoji-input-element
items.title: Emoji Input Element
items.description: An input component for emoji search and insertion.

items.name: excalidraw-element
items.title: Excalidraw Element
items.description: A drawing component powered by Excalidraw.

items.name: font-size-toolbar-button
items.title: Font Size Toolbar Button
items.description: A toolbar control for adjusting font size.

items.name: heading-element
items.title: Heading Element
items.description: A heading with multiple level support.

items.name: highlight-leaf
items.title: Highlight Leaf
items.description: A text highlighter with customizable colors.

items.name: hr-element
items.title: Horizontal Rule Element
items.description: A horizontal rule component with focus states.

items.name: image-element
items.title: Image Element
items.description: Image element with lazy loading, resizing capabilities, and optional caption.

items.name: image-preview
items.title: Image Preview
items.description: A modal component for previewing and manipulating images.

items.name: kbd-leaf
items.title: Keyboard Input Leaf
items.description: A component for styling keyboard shortcuts.

items.name: link-element
items.title: Link Element
items.description: A component for rendering hyperlinks with hover states.

items.name: list-element
items.title: List Element
items.description: A list element for ordered and unordered items.

items.name: media-audio-element
items.title: Media Audio Element
items.description: An audio player component with caption support.

items.name: media-embed-element
items.title: Media Embed Element
items.description: A component for embedded media content with resizing and caption support.

items.name: media-file-element
items.title: Media File Element
items.description: A file attachment component with download capability and caption.

items.name: media-placeholder-element
items.title: Media Placeholder Element
items.description: A placeholder for media upload progress indication.

items.name: media-video-element
items.title: Media Video Element
items.description: A video player component with YouTube and file upload support.

items.name: mention-element
items.title: Mention Element
items.description: A mention element with customizable prefix and label.

items.name: mention-input-element
items.title: Mention Input Element
items.description: An input component for user mentions with autocomplete.

items.name: paragraph-element
items.title: Paragraph Element
items.description: A paragraph block with background color support.

items.name: search-highlight-leaf
items.title: Search Highlight Leaf
items.description: A component that highlights search results in text.

items.name: slash-input-element
items.title: Slash Input Element
items.description: A command input component for inserting various elements.

items.name: table-cell-element
items.title: Table Cell Element
items.description: A table cell with resizable borders and selection.

items.name: table-element
items.title: Table Element
items.description: A table component with floating toolbar and border customization.

items.name: table-row-element
items.title: Table Row Element
items.description: A table row component with optional border hiding.

items.name: tag-element
items.title: Tag Element
items.description: A tag element component with selection states and styling.

items.name: toc-element
items.title: TOC Element
items.description: A table of contents component with links to document headings.

items.name: todo-list-element
items.title: Todo List Element
items.description: A checkbox list element with interactive todo items.

items.name: toggle-element
items.title: Toggle Element
items.description: A collapsible component for toggling content visibility.

items.name: editor-ai
items.description: An AI editor

items.name: editor-select
items.description: A multi-select editor

items.name: editor-basic
items.description: A basic editor

items.title: AI
items.description: AI menu with commands, streaming responses in a preview or directly into the editor.

items.name: align-demo
items.description: Text alignment controls for blocks.

items.name: autoformat-demo

items.description: Apply formatting automatically using shortcodes.

items.name: basic-elements-demo
items.description: Basic block elements like headings, quotes, and code blocks.

items.name: basic-marks-demo
items.description: Basic text formatting marks like bold, italic, and underline.

items.description: Basic block elements and text marks.

items.name: block-menu-demo
items.description: Block-level context menu with formatting options.

items.name: block-selection-demo
items.description: Visual block selection with keyboard support.

items.name: column-demo
items.description: Column layout.

items.name: comments-demo
items.description: Adding and displaying comments within content.

items.name: copilot-demo
items.description: Renders AI ghost text suggestions at the cursor position.

items.name: cursor-overlay-demo
items.title: Cursor Overlay
items.description: Visual indicator for cursor position within the editor.

items.name: date-demo
items.description: Inline date elements with calendar selection interface.

items.name: dnd-demo

items.description: Implements draggable functionality for editor blocks, including drag handles and drop indicators.

items.name: emoji-demo
items.description: Emoji insertion via toolbar or colon-triggered combobox.

items.description: LaTeX equations with inline and block formats.

items.name: find-replace-demo
items.description: Find and replace functionality in text.

items.name: floating-toolbar-demo
items.description: Floating toolbar with text formatting and AI assistance options.

items.name: font-demo
items.description: Color picker for text and background colors.

items.name: highlight-demo
items.description: Text highlighting with customizable colors.

items.name: horizontal-rule-demo
items.description: Horizontal lines for visually separating content sections.

items.name: indent-list-demo
items.description: Turn any block into a list item.

items.name: line-height-demo
items.description: Line height adjustment controls.

items.name: link-demo
items.description: Hyperlinks with toolbar insertion and URL pasting support.

items.name: list-demo
items.description: List creation and formatting.

items.name: media-demo
items.description: Media embedding and management.

items.name: mention-demo
items.description: Mention functionality for referencing users or entities.

items.description: Copy paste from CSV to Slate.

items.description: Copy paste from DOCX to Slate.

items.description: Copy paste from HTML to Slate.

items.title: Serializing Markdown
items.description: Copy paste from Markdown to Slate.

items.description: Restrict the editor to a single block.

items.description: Slash command menu for quick insertion of various content types.
